description: This file defines a REST controller called HelloController in a Spring Boot application. It provides several lightweight, unauthenticated public endpoints for root, documentation, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A Spring Boot REST controller exposing public endpoints for root, documentation, health, and info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a friendly welcome message at root URL.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to Swagger UI documentation page.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Provides a simple health status response.
